title: Slow cooker Mediterranean-style turkey stew
ingredients: ['1 (1.8kg) boneless turkey breast', '1/2 cup chicken broth, divided', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '300g chopped onion', '75g pitted Kalamata olives', '55g oil-packed sun dried tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon savoury seasoning or mixed herbs', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons plain flour']
